title: Gems Delivery ( Master P interview)
itunes:title: Gems Delivery ( Master P interview)
description:
Today on the show we had Master p call in where he discusses Reebok, Teaching Economic Empowerment, Ownership and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Brett Favre for making hypocritical comments about Deshaun Watson’s Trade request and Angela helped some listeners out during Ask Yee with one listener questioning her boyfriends sexuality just because he went to jail.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
